Derivation of the revolution constraint 

$$ 
\begin{aligned}
&                &\frac{(1-\mu)\bar{y}}{1-\delta}  & >y^p \\
&\Leftrightarrow & \frac{(1-\mu)\bar{y}}{1-\delta} & >\frac{(1-\theta)\bar{y}}{1-\delta} && \left|\ \text{Multiply by } \frac{1}{\bar{y}} \text{ and } (1-\delta)\right. \\
&\Leftrightarrow & 1-\mu                           & > 1-\theta && \left|\ -1\right. \\ 
&\Leftrightarrow & -\mu                            & > -\theta && \left|\ \text{Multiply by } (-1)\right. \\
&\Leftrightarrow & \mu                             & < \theta 
\end{aligned}
$$
